General.Name: Kukbo Trans
General.Description: KUKBO Logistics Co., Ltd. provides transportation services in South Korea. It offers international logistics, warehouse and storage, terminal and unloading, third party logistics, container cargo transportation, and mobility services. The company was formerly known as Kuk Bo Transportation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to KUKBO Logistics Co., Ltd. in October 1978. KUKBO Logistics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
